Name: The Bellows
About the game: 'Of all the things you choose in life, you don't get to choose what your nightmares are. You don't pick them; they pick you.' -- John Irving The Bellows is an experience designed with a singular focus. Scaring you, scaring your family, and scaring your friends. Plunge yourself into a world of nightmares and fear, and discover just how frightening virtual reality can be. Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
Developers: BOT Jungle Productions,Evan Davis,Bryce Davis,Gehrig Gosslin
